test_configurations.name: Basic Code Understanding
prompts: List all Python files in this repository

prompts: Find all functions that contain 'evaluate' in their name

prompts: Create a simple test file for the main module
Add a function to calculate the average of a list of numbers
Write a utility function to validate email addresses

test_configurations.name: Advanced Agent Tasks
prompts: Analyze the code structure and suggest improvements
Find potential security issues in the codebase
Identify code duplication and suggest refactoring
